A specifying whether or not to create a new instance if one is not found.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TagLib.Id3v2.TermsOfUseFrame GetPreferred (TagLib.Id3v2.Tag tag, string language);

Docs.param: A specifying a language to search for.
Docs.summary: Searches for the which most closely matches the specified description and language.
Docs.returns: The which most closely matches the specified language, or if none was found.
Docs.remarks: If an exact match is found, it will be returned. Otherwise the first frame found.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the ISO-639-2 language code of the current instance.
Docs.value: A containing an ISO-639-2 language code for the current instance.
Docs.remarks: If the language is unknown, "XXX" is the appropriate filler.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the text of the current instance.
Docs.value: A containing the text of the current instance.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the text encoding to use when rendering the current instance.
Docs.value: A specifying the text encoding to use when rendering.
Docs.remarks: This value is overridden if is or if the save version does not support it.

Docs.summary: This class is used for accessing and modifying ID3v2 Terms of Use (USER) frames.
